name: Natural Born Killers
description: Natural Born Killerz is the premire DOOM2 PWAD. Even though it currently has only 4 levels; soon 32. Not only are all the levels of the upmost quallity, you are rocked with some of the best MIDI music ever created! I didnt take any lame music; Only the best is in NBK. NBK also has a DeHackEd patch, it adds more fun to Death Match buy adding total annoymous game play. Try it!
